1083549886476402688.text: 5/ The people that we had to let go are each exceptional in their own right. I’m committed to doing everything possible to help them find their next role, so if anybody is looked for talented (and genuinely good) people in product, engineering, and operations - please reach out.

1083549705467035649.text: 4/ We also had to let go of a small group (<10% of Blockfolio headcount) to ensure ample runway to last the bear market while continuing to innovate. This does not change our product roadmap or our mission to be the best portfolio tracking platform in our ecosystem.

1083549601620209665.text: 3/ For over the past year, we had been incubating a separate company building a data ownership protocol called Datablock. With the market for token projects dramatically slowing, we decided it was best to sideline that project for now and focus completely on Blockfolio.

1083549483701620737.text: 2/ In 2015, Blockfolio made it through the bear market because we took the right steps then to be here now. To proactively ensure that we emerge from this winter as the continued leader in our space, we unfortunately recently had to make some difficult decisions.
